pages.title: Indian Rhino
pages.text: The Indian rhinoceros ($(o)Rhinoceros unicornis$()), also called the Indian rhino, greater one-horned rhinoceros or great Indian rhinoceros, is a rhinoceros species native to the Indian subcontinent.

pages.title: Indian Rhino
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:melon_slice$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
